name: Classic Bird Hunter: Real Forest Shooting Simultor
name_original: Classic Bird Hunter: Real Forest Shooting Simultor
description:
Ready to enter the shooting and hunting life of a simulator in the real safari, jungle environment? This Classic Bird Hunter: Real Forest Shooting Simulator is the game for best real men shooter people, in this simulation and 3D classic shooting game the gamerboy has to shoot the flying and in race of those eagles, ducks and seagulls that are flying high in the air , aiming is the key feature of this game, the better you aim the higher is your game points, more shooting more points. You want to give this game a try? then be prepared to come in the field of safari hunting as a perfect target sniper man.

The simple key features of Classic Bird Hunter: Real Forest Shooting Simultor are:
Shoot and aim at the target
Select the on-screen fire button to kill-shot dead down birds
Move left or right to aim well
Load your guns in this endless fight for hunt
3D simulation and thrilling game
Free to play

Begin the targeting now. You can be a good sniper, and this is the test try game for you to get your skills polished in sniping and hunting, press trigger when you are ready to move this bullet out of the heavy gyn. Flip position for extreme gameboy fun.
